game.name: Metanet Hunter G4
game.desc: Metanet Hunter G4 is an action platformer set in the heart of Cyberspace! Take on the role of a lone Cyberspace Samurai as you navigate through six adrenaline-pumping stages, each filled with intense side-scrolling challenges and epic boss battles. Armed with over 20 sub-weapons. Dive into Time Attack Mode to unlock funky color palettes and discover secrets and cheats scattered throughout the digital landscape. Get ready to experience the thrill of old-school platforming reimagined for the modern era in Metanet Hunter G4!
